form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, I-131 ( (REV. 6-1-73) N

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP $10.00 FEE PAID No. 144-46 OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES IMMIGRATION and NATURALIZATION SERVICE as provided in section 223 of the 41-320, Detroit, Mich Immigration and Nationality Act MAIL-FILE SECTION DATE 1-29-15 Use-typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. Verified by HIJ 0584239 issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt MOTACKA, WLAdSLAWA Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF JANINA SWAWICKI If you checked Extension' you must submit the reentry per- (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) mit you wish to have extended. MAILING ROUTE # 1, Box91 ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS IN U.S. (City) (State) GOBLES, Michigan 49055 (ZIP Code) A- 1 30 255 695 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 4-29-06 POLAND STATE LESS GRAY GRAY HEIGHT 5 FEET / INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 3. DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF MOTACKA, WLAdSLAWA IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED NEWYORK, NY 10-31-73 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) TWA 741 FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six month's in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL MOTACKA WLADYSLAWA NYC 10-31-73 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 4 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD AIRLINE MRCH-1975 3 MOENTH NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL FILL IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. NONE FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMPT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS-ATTACHED IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE w ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 3. PRESENT OCCUPATION: RETIRED NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER NONE c NONE 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) FRIERER ST. , 8 ESSEN 43, WEST GERMANY 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) WEST GERMANY 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): Visit RECEIVED OVER 2/20/15 TRANS IN RET'D TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM I-131 (REV. 6-1-73) N 2/5/75 4/7/75 DETIMETRO 2-21-75-11
